Body: Blockchain in Science makes a lot of sense, because Science is in need of an trusted mechanism that isn`t controlled by any entity. Currently Science output is controlled by some major players in the industry which is really keeping Science from achieving it`s true potential.  As a currency it also works to revolutionize how funding is gathered, by implementing a Proof of Stake consensus algorithm you will be able to support science with the transaction fees gathered from the network. This will allow us to create a brand new funding source and support Science in developing countries.  Another feature which also benefits from a cryptocurrency is our decentralized scientific marketplace which will allow scientists and researchers from all around the world to exchange services and equipment regardless of their location.

Title: [ANN][ITO] Scienceroot - The first Blockchain-based Scientific Ecosystem
Body: Scienceroot - Revolutionizing the scientific community with blockchain  Scienceroot aims to improve the scientific and research community using blockchain technology. The goal is to create an ecosystem where anyone in the scientific community around the globe will have the ability to gather funding, interact, discuss research ideas, collaborate and in the end, publish their work through a more efficient, open and transparent platform. Our scientific ecosystem will be powered by its own unique currency called Science Token (ST), which will be used to exchange funds, store articles on the blockchain, crowdfund scientific ideas, exchange services through our scientific marketplace and reward parties involved.
